Uses of Class
com.paypal.android.sdk.payments.PayPalPayment

    • Uses of PayPalPayment in com.paypal.android.sdk.payments

      Methods in com.paypal.android.sdk.payments that return PayPalPayment 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PayPalPayment PayPalPayment.bnCode(String bnCode)
      Adds optional Build Notation code (BN code) for partner tracking.
      PayPalPayment PayPalPayment.items(PayPalItem[] items)
      Adds optional array of PayPalItem.
      PayPalPayment PayPalPayment.paymentDetails(PayPalPaymentDetails paymentDetails)
      Adds optional payment amount details (item subtotal, shipping, and tax).
